phrases: All of Kosaku Kawajiri's shoes are a bit big for my own feet.
I need to switch them with
shoes that fit me, before they start to suspect something.
Are not you going to say goodbye?
Something terrifying happened in the basement!
I thought I was going to die!
but it gave me an excuse to dive into the arms
of the one I love so much.
Like that, and that, and that!
There is a cat I have never seen before in the basement!
So the reason it was really scary...
I went down to the basement
because I ran out of mineral water.
And you know how much I love cats, right?
So I was like, Oh, it is a British Blue.
and golden eyes contrasting with its velvet-like, blue-gray fur.
Where did you come in from?
It must have come in from there.
But I cannot let it stay down here forever.
It might pee on the potato sack it is sitting on,
and it might even have fleas.
It is okay to get closer if you do not make eye contact, right?
I just need to let it know that I am not its enemy.
My belly's up, which means I am being submissive.
Why am I trying to humor a cat?
If you do not get out of here, I will hit you with this!
It was clinging to the ceiling like some kind of bug!
A-And what really creeped me out was
that the cat had a hole in its throat.
A hole about as big as a one-yen coin!
And then, from the hole, I heard...
Could it be a hole from the arrow?
I just frantically waved the broom around and ran.
Please, could you go check it out?
One of the shards went right into its throat.
Apparently it had a hole in its throat, but...
Now there is no way to tell if it was a Stand user or not.
No, I am sure it was not...
Is not it a refreshing morning, now that the rain's stopped?
I just saw a rainbow in the sky
before I came into the studio.
Two days go, someone attacked me with an arrow,
Why cannot I move from here?
I get a bad feeling from her, he thought.
A whole bunch of glass stabbed me, and I could not move!
The reason I am like this now
When I got angry at that woman, something just came out.
He lived by his desire and instinct,
so he understood this power, as well as how to use it.
Why is this thing growing from where I buried the cat yesterday?
What did it do to that sparrow?
I could not see an actual Stand.
The most important thing is whether that thing is an enemy or not.
Is it an enemy who wishes to harm me, or is it...
I should probably kill it, just in case.
Is it a plant or an animal?
It would be easy to kill it,
but it might be worth watching for a while.
The way it turned around because it thought it was being called
is almost like a cat, as well...
The fact that it cannot resist trying to smell me is also like a cat.
It looks like it might be okay to pet it.
The way it is purring creepily
as it is about to fall asleep is also, indeed, like a cat.
But I am still not sure if it has any hostility toward me or not.
but this confirms that it does not have any hostility toward me.
This is definitely the cat that I buried here yesterday.
So it really did have a hole in its throat from the arrow!
That is where my toenail came off...
This cat attacked her because it had a grudge against her!
If she found out about this thing...
That rumor might eventually reach Jotaro Kujo and the others!
That would definitely be bad news!
That is where you buried the cat, right?
It seems like it is cursed, so I am really scared...
I did not bury it here.
You are lying out of consideration for me, are not you?
This cat means me harm, after all!
I still do not know what kind of Stand ability it has,
but I am going to get rid of it.
I feel bad for you, but I am going to blow you up with this.
There is no way it can be a dud!
Is it because of this thing?
Is this thing's ability keeping it from exploding?
I told you to go back into the house!
The moment Deadly Queen's bomb moved away from that thing, it went off!
The plant that was a cat until yesterday thought,
I am going to kill that woman!
I cannot allow you to attack her anymore.
I am going to have to make you disappear.
Then I will just have to kill this man who is getting in my way, too!
The only time the bomb does not explode is when there is no air around it.
This plant instinctively knew just how it should kill him.
Could its Stand ability be the ability to control air freely?
I cannot see it, but it released something again.
It is releasing bubbles of air!
It is like I am stepping on an invisible balloon!
It really is controlling the air.
I cannot see it, but I am sure it released an air bubble again.
Was I, Yoshikage Kira, just relieved
at the fact that the cactus needles did not pierce her eyes?
Am I actually worried about someone else?
I am just worried that if this woman dies, Jotaro Kujo
will find out about this house!
That is the only reason I was relieved that she was okay.
That attack will not work anymore.
Even though I may not be able to see it,
now that I know the mystery behind it...
It is just an ability that allows you to blow and spread air bubbles.
You are no longer a match for Deadly Queen.
Th-This thing just... put an air bubble into my veins!
It is rising higher and higher into my body!
I am not that knowledgeable in medicine, but I have heard
that if you inject more than 10cc of air into a human being's veins,
it can block the vein and lead to death.
I have no choice... I have to do it.
Its ability to freely control the air...
It is going to attack again!
For now, I guess I will let this go.
A Plant That Was Once a
A Plant That Was Once a Cat
He told me yesterday that he buried that cat's corpse far away.
The cat's curse, as he said,
was just an illusion my mind came up with out of fear.
I suddenly fainted in front of him...
He took care of me, even though it made him late to work.
It felt like our hearts were connected.
That was the happiest morning of my life.
He left without saying goodbye again.
You do not like shiitake mushrooms, so I took them out of yours...
When did you start liking them?
You have already eaten more than half of it.
But I am happy to see you gobbling down my cooking.
I guess you realized that you only thought you did not like them, huh?
I wanted him to give me a goodbye kiss.
But we are understanding each other's feelings.
I will seduce him soon enough.
He was using a shoehorn to put on his shoes.
I am sure he put on the 25.5cm sized shoes.
Having two different sizes of shoes is weird.
It is also weird that Mom and Dad are getting along lately.
He was even gobbling up the shiitake mushrooms that he hates.
Why was he writing his own name over and over?
No matter how many times I see it, that is potting soil.
And I think the other thing he has is a bag of cat food.
And then he goes inside his closet...
Do they have to wear those for school?
Wh-What is that bizarrely shaped thing?
It is too dark for me to see it clearly.
It has eyeballs, and it is looking this way!
Could that cat food be for this thing?
Oh, is the thing you forgot
Shall I get it for you?
Something I cannot see that is inflated,
like some kind of air bubble, has my arms and neck pinned down!
I-It attacked me when I tried to shut the window?
Does this thing need sunlight to move?
Did Stray Cat wear itself out trying to
get the cat food from the shelf using air?
I thought it would stay calm if there was no sunlight hitting it,
but I guess a tiny bit of light was coming in.
I thought that maybe Hayato had gotten in here,
but it appears that it was, thankfully, just my imagination.
If that brat knew the truth about me,
I would have had to kill him.
He has Dad's face, but that is not my dad.
